recipesJson.name: S'Mores!!!!
recipesJson.author: RUG_ly
recipesJson.description:
Ejuice Recipes Tips and Tricks DIY Made Easy Ep. 008: 3 Ingredient Desserts

Watch the Video here: https://youtu.be/AvqahNIlpXM

reviews.text: Just mixed this one up couple days ago because I absolutely love S'mores and boy o boy did it not dissapoint! Very realistic and not stupidly sweet like a lot of s'mores mixes out there. The chocolate is nicely detectable while you get lovely notes of the graham craker and gooey marshmallow. Very good basic 3 ingredient mix!
